title: 'Very good perfectly fit jacket.'
body: Very good stylish outdoor jacket with perfect fit. For temperature 14-20degree centigrade. Not suitable for extreme cold climate, not a summer wear either but very useful for people residing in Bangalore, Mumbai etc where there is mild winter and also for travellers. Although I live in Delhi, right now I am also using it as a second layer of protection below my main full sleeve jacket. I'm using shirt size 40- 42.Jacket size= XL. Having flat belly.
